title: LOL wont open
body: After re-downloading League of legends and installing it i click launch and it and the menu sits there and then closes like i never opened the game

replies.body: Be sure to give your pc a solid restart incase something crashed in the background.  If the client still isn't loading then a security setting may be preventing that.  You'll want to go over each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is being added as an exception.  Hopefully that will get you squared away!
